Smokescreen/Beachcomber:



Smokescreen awoke, feeling the Ark shake.  Taking out his elector-discharge 
rifle, he ran out of his quarters, heading for the outside of the ship.

---

Beachcomber, looking for quarters, hit the wall as the Ark shook.  Raising 
his laser rifle, he charged off to fight the enemies.
